--- title: "Post-Audit Development" format: html: reference-location: block editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- ::: {.cell} ::: # Findings Between the dates of **2022-06-14** and **2024-03-12** *(approx 637 days)*, - 512 Dates of Service were recorded - 7158 Unique Patients were seen - Referred by 232 different Providers - Seen by 66 different Rendering Providers # EDA ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} cclaims |> cheapr::overview(hist = TRUE, digits = 2) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` obs: 49711 cols: 24 ----- Numeric ----- col class n_missng p_complt n_unique mean p0 p25 p50 p75 1 ptage integr 2 1 94 33.41 0 16 28 48 2 .enc integr 0 1 80 7.58 1 1 4 10 3 .ord integr 0 1 12 1.42 1 1 1 1 4 units integr 0 1 12 1.19 0 1 1 1 5 charges numerc 0 1 95 234.85 0 175 190 215 6 allowed numerc 16170 0.67 876 106.9 0 71 98.79 115.8 7 payments numerc 0 1 2450 93.51 0 56.05 80.73 111.94 8 adjustments numerc 0 1 1600 119.65 0 0 94.67 127.57 p100 iqr sd hist 1 93 32 20.96 ▇▆▅▃▁ 2 80 9 9.64 ▇▁▁▁▁ 3 12 0 1.02 ▇▁▁▁▁ 4 11 0 0.87 ▇▁▁▁▁ 5 27060 40 299.7 ▇▁▁▁▁ 6 2100 44.8 84.59 ▇▁▁▁▁ 7 27060 55.89 216.86 ▇▁▁▁▁ 8 2268 127.57 177.27 ▇▁▁▁▁ ----- Dates ----- col class n_missng p_complt n_unique min max 1 dos Date 0 1 521 2022-06-14 2024-03-12 2 ptdob Date 2 1 6094 1929-08-22 2022-01-11 ----- Categorical ----- col class n_missng p_complt n_unique n_levels 1 ptid chrctr 0 1 7158 NA 2 refer factor 36934 0.26 232 232 3 render factor 0 1 66 66 4 icd10 chrctr 703 0.99 1633 NA 5 hcpcs chrctr 0 1 49 NA 6 desc chrctr 0 1 96 NA 7 mods factor 39176 0.21 17 17 8 pos factor 0 1 8 8 9 pos_type factor 0 1 2 3 10 location factor 0 1 4 4 11 inclass chrctr 0 1 8 NA 12 inprim chrctr 0 1 22 NA 13 insec chrctr 44705 0.1 20 NA 14 adj_codes chrctr 13772 0.72 83 NA min max 1 PT0001 PT7158 2 REFR001 <|||PHD REFR232 <|||NP 3 PROV01 PROV66 4 A69.20 -> E06.3 -> F90.9 Z92.81 5 80305 WORK COMP 6 BARIATRIC NEW PATIENT WORK COMP 7 95 HJ = 95 8 10 56 9 Non-Facility Facility 10 Clinic School 11 COMMERCIAL WORK COMP 12 AETNA WELLCARE 13 AARP UHC 14 CO-131 PR-A1 ``` ::: :::
::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} cclaims |> select(dos, ptid) |> distinct() |> dplyr::count(dos) |> ggplot() + geom_step(aes(dos, n), color = "#E87800", direction = "hv") + fuimus::gg_theme() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](claims_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){fig-align='center' width=100%} ::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} cclaims |> select(dos, ptid, pos_type, render) |> distinct() |> dplyr::count(dos, pos_type) |> # mutate(n = cumsum(n), .by = c(pos_type, render)) |> ggplot() + geom_step(aes(dos, n, colour = pos_type), direction = "hv") + fuimus::gg_theme() + theme(legend.position = "bottom") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](claims_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){fig-align='center' width=100%} ::: ::: ## Ratio Analysis Revenue Per Visit : $RPV =$ Total Payments $\div$ Number of Patient Visits ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} insurance_summary |> reframe( ins_prim, pts = patients, vpp = visits / patients, ppp = procedures / patients, rpp = revenue / patients, ppv = procedures / visits, rpv = revenue / visits, rpp = revenue / procedures ) |> arrange(desc(pts)) |> gt(rowname_col = "ins_prim") |> opt_all_caps() |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |> tab_options(table.width = pct(100), quarto.disable_processing = TRUE) ``` ::: # Reimbursement ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} pprrvu ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 7,882 × 14 date_start
